I can help you set up Remote Desktop access to your Ace Cloud server! üñ•Ô∏è

**For Windows:**

1Ô∏è‚É£ Use our RDP Generator Tool:
üîó https://www.acecloudhosting.com/downloads/

2Ô∏è‚É£ Download and run the tool
3Ô∏è‚É£ Enter your server details
4Ô∏è‚É£ Click "Generate" to create your RDP shortcut
5Ô∏è‚É£ Double-click the shortcut to connect!

**For Mac:**

1Ô∏è‚É£ Download Microsoft Remote Desktop from App Store
2Ô∏è‚É£ Follow our setup guide:
üîó https://www.acecloudhosting.com/knowledgebase/new-ace-cloud-hosting-setup-guide-mac/

3Ô∏è‚É£ Add your server connection
4Ô∏è‚É£ Enter credentials and connect

**For Mobile (iOS/Android):**

1Ô∏è‚É£ Install Microsoft Remote Desktop app
2Ô∏è‚É£ Add new PC connection
3Ô∏è‚É£ Enter server address and credentials

**Need your server details?**
Check your welcome email or contact support@acecloudhosting.com

Having trouble? I can connect you to a technician!

Please refer to the below link for instructions on How you can setup the Ace Cloud server on your MacOS computer.
